comments: Normalized Delta generates Ramanujan tau function.
links: B. Brent, Quadratic Minima and Modular Forms, Experimental Mathematics, v.7 no.3, 257-274.
mathematica: a[n_] := (delta = Series[ q*Product[ (1-q^k)^24, {k, 1, n}] , {q, 0, n+1}]; SeriesCoefficient[ Series[ delta^-n, {q, 0, 0}], 0]); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 13}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 20 2012 *)
author: Barry Brent (barryb(AT)primenet.com)
